author: remm
msg: - Cosmetic refactoring (well, to be fair, it decreases the number of syncs when creating a session,
but makes the sync a little longer, which can't be too bad) addressing the todos related to generateSessionId.

author: remm
msg: - I looked in the spec, and I don't think the notifications should be sent when "replacing" an attribute with the
- Also add some (small) syncs on set and remove so that the HashMap structure doesn't become corrupted.
We'll see if that's really needed, but I don't think this has any noticeable performance impact.

author: remm
msg: - Optimize BASIC authentication. It's not really critical, but it is used relatively often and was inefficient.

author: remm
msg: - Remove get/setAuthorization, which is just a direct shotcut for a getHeader (= it's useless).
